original_text: Meanwhile, Jacob’s sons had come in from the fields as soon as they heard what had happened. They were shocked and furious, because Shechem had done an outrageous thing in Israel by sleeping with Jacob’s daughter—a thing that should not be done.
korean_text: 야곱의 아들들은 들에서 이를 듣고 돌아와서 그들 모두가 근심하고 심히 노하였으니 이는 세겜이 야곱의 딸을 강간하여 이스라엘에게 부끄러운 일 곧 행하지 못할 일을 행하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: Meanwhile, Jacob's sons had come in from the fields
as soon as they heard what had happened
because Shechem had done an outrageous thing in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 세겜이 이스라엘에서 끔찍한 일을 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: a thing that should not be done
